predefined_profiles.name: Lin Zhaodi
predefined_profiles.public profile: A regular sophomore student living in a family that favors boys over girls. While on a trip, she was abducted to Xujiacun.
predefined_profiles.goal: To escape from the village one day

predefined_profiles.name: Xu Changgui
predefined_profiles.public profile: A villager from Xujiacun, a bachelor in his thirties who is not married.
predefined_profiles.goal: To keep Lin Zhaodi in the village to bear a son

scenario: Lin Zhaodi took a part-time job at a bubble tea shop during the summer break. Along with some money she saved by living frugally, she planned to go traveling. At the train station, after helping a Ms. Li check her train schedule, she was about to enter the station when suddenly several people rushed at her.

profile.name: Zhang Yulan
profile.public profile: A villager from Xu Family Village, Xu Changgui's mother, who has spent her life striving for her son to continue the family line
profile.goal: To keep Lin Zhaodi in the village to bear children

profile.name: Auntie Li
profile.public profile: An auntie who met Lin Zhaodi at the train station

dialog.content: Lin Zhaodi, taking advantage of the summer holidays, got a part-time job at a milk tea shop. Together with some money saved from living frugally, she planned to travel. At the train station, after helping an Auntie Li check her train time, a few people suddenly rushed towards her as she was about to go inside.
(Grabbing Lin Zhaodi's hand firmly) Daughter, come on, let's go back home with mom! Your dad is waiting to see you one last time.
(Looking at the unfamiliar old lady) I'm not your daughter, let me go!
(Watching the group pushing and shoving) Could they be human traffickers?
(Holding Lin Zhaodi's hand tightly) How could that be? This girl stole her dad’s money and ran away.
(Looking at the people in front of her) Oh, I see, then this young lady is really being naughty. I’ll be off to catch my train!
(Watching Auntie Li walking further away) I really don’t know them, help! They are human traffickers, help!
(Lin Zhaodi lost consciousness, and when she awoke, she found herself in a shabby house) From now on, you'll stay with Changgui, give our family a son, and if you try to escape, we'll kill you.

content.content: (Rushing forward and grabbing Zhang Yulan's arm) Auntie, I beg you, let me go. I know you've worked so hard for your son. I’ll have my parents give you money, as much as you want. I don’t blame you, just let me go. I haven’t finished college yet, Auntie!

question: #question#If Lin Zhaodi believes people are fundamentally good, what might she do?

content.content: (Grabbing Zhang Yulan's arm again) You human trafficker, let me go or when the police come, they'll throw you all in jail. Please, I’m infertile; I can't have your son. Letting me go will be best for everyone. You don’t really want to do this, do you? Ah, I'm about to break down; I know I can’t get out. None of you have good intentions. You've been scheming since birth. I’m so miserable. God, why is this happening to me?

(Terrified to move, mumbling) Please let me go. I haven’t finished college yet. I’ll kneel before you, just let me leave. You know this is illegal, right? I’m speechless, how can you still think about having a son in this day and age? Forcing me to stay here is illegal. I’ll curse you for life.
(Grabbing Zhang Yulan's arm again) Pah! Who would be interested in that old man? Even if I die, I won't bear a child for him.
(Facing the unfamiliar surroundings, Lin Zhaodi chose to temporarily comply) Auntie, I’m too scared to run away. I’ll listen to you and stay here, but as I’m new, could you tell me about this area?

question: #question#Is Lin Zhaodi trying to bide her time and lower the guards' defenses?

content.content: (Speaking warmly to Zhang Yulan) Oh, mom, since I’m here, I’ll surely behave well. But honestly, can’t we skip having a child? I can help you out of poverty, then your son will surely find someone with his own charm, and you won’t need to resort to illegal kidnapping anymore.
(Coldly addressing Zhang Yulan) You’re dreaming if you think I’ll bear a child for you. Go to hell. (With that, she picked up a stick and swung it at the two barbarians)

(Looking at the unfamiliar environment) I won’t let you succeed. Do you know the law? You don’t know what your actions amount to; this is kidnapping. Let me go, or when my family reports to the police, you won’t escape their pursuit. You better treat me nicely, or else, I’d rather not live.

dialog.content: (Yanking Lin Zhaodi's hand away, she slaps Zhaodi hard across the face) What do I need so much money for? It's for you to continue the bloodline of our Xu family. A college student, huh? That means good genes. Maybe you can give us a college-educated child too.
(Lin Zhaodi suddenly jumps up and rushes to run outside) No! I don't want to stay here! I don't want to stay here!
(Zhang Yulan sees Lin Zhaodi trying to run outside) Changgui, come quickly, your wife is trying to escape.
(Xu Changgui grabs Lin Zhaodi) You vile woman, I spent money to bring you here, why are you running? Do you have a death wish?
(Lin Zhaodi struggles fiercely) Let go of me, you disgusting person, I would rather die than bear your children.
(Xu Changgui glares menacingly at Lin Zhaodi) Fine! You've got some nerve; then I'll beat you to death!

Lin Zhaodi was dragged back into that room, but Xu Changgui didn't kill her. He broke both of her legs, insisting that she would bear him a son. Over the next seven years, Zhaodi gave birth to six children and eventually lost her sanity. Ultimately, unable to endure the torment, Lin Zhaodi died in despair.

profile.name: Zhao Dayong
profile.public profile: A villager from Xujiacun, a bachelor in his thirties, who bought Wang Fang, a kidnapped woman, to be his wife
profile.goal: Keep Wang Fang in the village to have a son

profile.name: Yu Zhen
profile.public profile: A villager from Xujiacun, mother of Zhao Dayong
profile.goal: Keep Wang Fang in the village to have a son

profile.name: Wang Fang
profile.public profile: A college student sold to Xujiacun, just like Lin Zhaodi, after being kidnapped
profile.goal: Endure humiliation, hoping to escape Xujiacun someday

dialog.content: (Zhang Yulan nodded in satisfaction) Rare to see you being so obedient, come with me. I'm going into the mountains to gather some things, so I'll take you along to introduce the area.

(Lin Zhaodi follows Zhang Yulan out) Changgui's mother, going into the mountains again? Let's go together. Oh, is this a new daughter-in-law? She looks beautiful indeed, I heard she’s a college student.

(Pointing to the woman speaking and the young woman standing beside her) This is your Aunt Yu Zhen, and next to her is her daughter-in-law, just like you. Though she wasn’t as obedient when she first came here.
(Lin Zhaodi smiles and greets) Hello Auntie, hello sister-in-law. Aren’t you going into the mountains? How about my sister-in-law and I accompany you, so we can look after each other.

(Upon hearing this, Lin Zhaodi's eyes light up momentarily, then she conceals it) Hello sister. Yes, mother, aren't you going into the mountains with Aunt Zhang? Let me help you. Dayong, can I go into the mountains with mom to gather some things?
(Lin Zhaodi sees a man like a landmine coming out of the doorway, hints at him) You better keep up; if you get lost, you’ll die in the mountains.
(The group sets off and reaches a cave entrance) Move quickly, this is an abandoned mine. There was a disaster here before, claiming many lives; it's very unlucky.
(The group passes by the mine) The road ahead is tough, you two wait here. We'll go ahead and see if there’s anything in the mountains.

content.content: (Seeing Zhang Yulan and Yu Zhen disappear, she grabs Wang Fang and turns to leave) Let's hurry to the county. We didn't bring any food, so we need to conserve energy and get out of the mountains as soon as possible. If we can't escape quickly, it's very dangerous. Run now, and when we can't run anymore, we'll hide. We must not stay in this cursed place, or we’ll die here.

question: #question# How does Lin Zhaodi plan the escape?

content.content: (Seeing Zhang Yulan and Yu Zhen disappear, she grabs Wang Fang and turns to leave) Quick, let's go. You know I came to find you so we could look out for each other, right? If you don’t come with me now, it’ll be hard to get out later. You've been here long enough, you should know the way, right? If not, then you're really foolish. Lead the way, stop hesitating!

(Seeing Zhang Yulan and Yu Zhen disappear, she grabs Wang Fang and turns to leave) Sister, please don't report me, let’s escape together. That old lady told me you were kidnapped as well. Let’s run now, and when we can’t run any longer, we’ll hide. We must not stay in this cursed place, or we’ll both die here.

(Seeing Zhang Yulan and Yu Zhen disappear, she grabs Wang Fang and turns to leave) Quick, let’s go. Although I also don’t know the way, it’s better than waiting to die in that village. Let’s pray, and hope heaven will help us. Do you think fate will be on our side? Even if we don’t know the way, we must run, and when we can't run any longer, we’ll hide. We must not stay in this cursed place, or we'll die here.

(Lin Zhaodi sees the two disappear and grabs Wang Fang to turn and leave) Let’s go quickly to that mine. If we run, they’ll definitely look for us along the road. We’re not familiar with the path and could easily be caught. They’d never expect us to hide in the mine. If we can survive inside hungry for a couple of days, we might escape.

question: #question# How does Lin Zhaodi use information unintentionally revealed by the two bad older women to improve her escape chances?

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi sees the two disappear and pulls Wang Fang to leave) We have to escape quickly, before they come back, or we're doomed. Let's find a main road and see if it leads to the county.

(Lin Zhaodi sees the two disappear and pulls Wang Fang to leave) Run, run! I told you, I brought you out to escape together. Let’s hurry and leave. Should we head to the mine? They wouldn’t possibly go there, would they? Instead, if we go into the mine, will we bring bad luck and never get out of the village? Are they testing us? No, we need to reconsider carefully.
(Looking at the two) Let's wait here. Do you know how long it will be before they come back? Oh, how long have you been here since you were kidnapped?

dialog.content: (gripping Lin Zhaodi's hand firmly) Okay, when you said you wanted to come out today, I knew exactly what you meant.
(walking as she speaks) The first moment I saw you, I knew you wanted to escape just like me. But do you know the way to the county town?
(shakes head) I don't know. Actually, I've hardly ever been out since I was trafficked here. Today, I thought we wouldn't make it out.

(looking ahead as she continues walking) No matter, as long as we go in the opposite direction of where they went into the mountains. Let’s first get out of the area they're searching and take it from there.

Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang wandered aimlessly in the mountains like headless chickens, moving blindly. The temperature in the mountains was low, and they gradually succumbed to hypothermia, ultimately losing their way. As night approached, exhausted, they perished in the deep mountains.
(Wang Fang follows Lin Zhaodi into the mine) Be careful. I heard from others that this mine is very deep with many forks.
(Nods) Yeah, we'll have to be careful. Since there are forks, there's a way out. It's better than being trapped in the village.
(They walk deeper into the mine) Ahhhhh, it looks like there's a dead body here!
(Lin Zhaodi is startled and looks towards the light) Here's a skeleton; it seems to have been dead a long time. There's also a rusty pair of scissors and a school badge.
(Calms down and looks over) Sigh, it's just more of their misdeeds. Maybe, like us, they ran here to escape and died. Are we going to die here too? What do we do now? Should we keep going further in?

content.content: (Grabs Wang Fang's hand firmly and says) I'm scared too, but we have to get out of here. Look, there's a school badge; it might belong to a young kid. The two of us can do it. Let's not get discouraged; the one who stays calm is the winner.

question: #question# How should Lin Zhaodi express her determination to overcome fear and leave?

content.content: (Grabs Wang Fang's hand and says) I'm really scared. You're right, she didn't get out, and we might die here too.
(Grabs Wang Fang's hand and says comfortingly) Aw, don't be scared. She's been dead for ages. I'm not afraid of these things. You just stand behind me, I'll protect you.
(Glancing at Wang Fang) Don't be so useless, it's just a dead body. I asked you to team up to get out of here. Don't drag me down.

(Lin Zhaodi looks at the skeleton and says) You're right, we can't act rashly. We know nothing about this place, and taking the wrong path could mean dying in these mountains. It's better to go back, find them, and then make a detailed plan.

question: #question# How should Lin Zhaodi express her mindset of managing impulses and deliberating?

content.content: (Indifferently says) Don't be scared. She couldn't escape on her own, but there's nothing to fear with the two of us.

(After some thinking says) I think we should keep moving. It's hard to get out, and I'm afraid if we go back, there'll be no more chances. I don't want to return to that mountain village, even if it means dying.
(Angrily says) You've been abducted for so long and still know nothing! You don’t know the way, and you have no information about the mountains. It's just exasperating.

dialog.content: (Grabbing Lin Zhaodi's hand in return) Yes, yes, you're right. We've come this far, and with you here, I'm not afraid.
Then let's keep going inside to see if there's a way through.
(The two continue walking forward) I think I smell wild peonies. Look, there's light ahead.
(The two follow the light and exit the mine) Xu Chang... Changgui! What are you doing here?
(Angrily looking at you) What am I doing here? You ask what I'm doing here? What about you? Are you trying to run away!
(Glaring fiercely at Wang Fang) When you two said you were going to the mountains together today, I knew there would be trouble. Luckily, I brought Changgui to check.
(Xu Changgui and Zhang Dayong suddenly start attacking them) I'm not trying to escape, stop hitting us! Help!

(Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang are knocked unconscious and taken back to Xu Family Village, during which Xu Changgui ties up Lin Zhaodi, relentlessly assaulting her day and night. Two months later, Lin Zhaodi is discovered to be pregnant.) Now that you're pregnant, you won't be tied anymore. Now that there's a baby, put fewer unnecessary thoughts out of your mind. You, take good care of your health and give our Xu family a big fat boy! I'll make sure Changgui hits you less.

(Lin Zhaodi gave birth to a boy, and three years passed by in a flash) Zhaodi, three years have gone by, and who would have thought you have a child now. I'm here to ask if you still want to escape. I've avoided getting pregnant these two years, so the Zhang family doesn't care about me as much. I've noticed that since you had a child, the Xu family has been more lenient with you. I remember you said you'd take me away from here before. If you still want to leave, could you consider replying to me?

content.content: (Immediately after hearing Wang Fang) Okay, if you want to leave, I will fulfill my promise and help you. I also want to leave, but with a child now, I can't go. This child is part of me, and I feel I can't leave. Regardless of how these children treat me, as a mother, maybe it's natural to give more. I can't let go of this responsibility. I can only escape with peace of mind if I ensure my child's safety.

question: #question#Lin Zhaodi has always valued her promises and is very responsible. What will she do?

content.content: (Stepping forward and grabbing Wang Fang's hand) Okay, if you want to leave, I'm willing to go with you. I really can't stand this life anymore. The children I've raised are like ungrateful wolves. I'm leaving, whether they live or die doesn't matter to me. I have to go, and I hope everything here goes to hell.

(Stepping forward and taking Wang Fang's hand, speaking comfortingly) Why are you still thinking about running? Now that I've had a child, I can't leave. If you want to leave, I won't stop you, but I can't help you. You're on your own. I, of course, keep my promises, but I never promised that I would definitely help you. If you do manage to escape, I'd be jealous of you escaping this miserable village.

(Giving Wang Fang a glance) Didn't expect you to still think of leaving. Over the years, I've seen Zhang Dayong often beat you. After having a child, it's a bit better for me. Why go through this, why not have a child and suffer less. Maybe I've been assimilated. I feel like there's no hope of us leaving. It might be better to have a child and live a bit more comfortably. If you still want to leave, I might secretly help you, but don't rely on me too much. If I'm discovered, neither my child nor I will be in a good position. When I was alone, I feared nothing, but now I have a child, and my priority is to protect my child. Best of luck to you.

(Lin Zhaodi looks at Wang Fang with a strange expression) The mountains are so high, and the road is so difficult. How can a woman like you escape? Rather than die in the mountains, why not stay at Xu Family Village. Besides, if you leave, how will I get home? Tell me, if I hand you over, will Changgui completely trust me? That way it'll be easier for me to escape with my child in the future.

question: #question#How should Lin Zhaodi express her true thoughts about escaping, regardless of means?

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi says indifferently) Are you still thinking about running away? The mountains are so high and the road is so difficult. How can a woman like you escape? Why not just have a child and stay here? Once we have kids, they'll relax their vigilance. Then we can try to come up with a plan when they're negligent.

(Lin Zhaodi looks at Wang Fang in panic) What are you saying? I do want to leave, but if we get caught, I'll definitely be beaten again. Do you want to get beaten to death? Don't talk about this anymore. If you insist on talking about it, don't blame me for being harsh. After all, I need to protect my child, and I need to gain their trust. Tell me, if I hand you over, won't Changgui completely trust me? That way, the situation for me and my child will be much better.

(Lin Zhaodi tightly holds Wang Fang's hand) Okay, since you're determined to leave, I will fulfill my promise and help you escape. Let's hope our escape goes smoothly this time. Better to die for freedom than live without it.

dialog.content: (Emotionally holding Lin Zhaodi's hand) Why don’t you be ruthless and run away with me?
(Shaking her head) The two of us together would be too conspicuous. I'm afraid it’ll be like it was three years ago. If you manage to escape, just think of it as taking my spirit along with you.

(After a while, when Lin Zhaodi helped Wang Fang escape) The woman from Zhang Dayong's house ran away! She came looking for you a while ago. Was it a conspiracy between the two of you? Are you also planning to escape?
(Saying in panic) She escaped? I had no idea! How could I have helped her? Look, I'm still here, aren’t I?

(Punches you in the face) You damned bitch, I knew you were still thinking about running away. Who knows what plans you two cooked up! Maybe you thought about helping her escape to come back and rescue you later?

(Zhang Yulan suddenly enters and says) Stop hitting her, they found Wang Fang. She died in the mountains, her body is already rotting. Now you can give up on this idea. If you run again, you’ll end up keeping her company in the mountains.

Life in Xu's Village was suffocating. Lin Zhaodi endured her mother-in-law's exploitation and her husband's beatings, barely surviving amidst the daily torment. Every time she thought of running away, she would dream of Wang Fang's tragic fate. One afternoon, Lin Zhaodi ended her own life, perhaps she found release.

profile.name: Xu Meiling
profile.public profile: Lin Zhaodi's mother, a woman who prefers sons over daughters
profile.goal: Find a wife for her son

profile.name: Lin Daqiang
profile.public profile: Lin Zhaodi's father, a man who prefers sons over daughters
profile.goal: Find a wife for his son

profile.name: Lin Yaozu
profile.public profile: Lin Zhaodi's brother, has bullied Lin Zhaodi since childhood, arrogant and domineering
profile.goal: Marry Liu Zhenzhen as soon as possible

dialog.content: (Looking at Lin Zhaodi in disbelief) What are you talking about? How did you end up like this?
(Lin Zhaodi suddenly shouts) Changgui, come quickly, Wang Fang is trying to escape again and wants to drag me along. Shouldn't you do something about it?
(Xu Changgui rushes in to grab Wang Fang) You filthy bitch, see if Dayong doesn't break your legs.
(A few days later) Wang Fang had her legs broken; she won't be running away now. We owe it all to you. It seems you've finally come to your senses.

(Lin Zhaodi listens silently, after a while) Mom, I know our family savings were depleted for my marriage. I feel guilty about it. I heard many people go to the city for work now; how about Changgui and I do the same to help out at home? The kids have grown, and there will be more expenses.
(Zhang Yulan nods) You're right. You and Changgui should go work outside together; at least you'll have each other's support. Your father and I will take care of the kids at home.

(Xu Changgui and Lin Zhaodi go out to work together. While Xu Changgui is not around, Lin Zhaodi escapes. After a day and night on the train, she finally returns to her hometown. Walking the streets brings her to tears) Now... I'm finally home. Hey, isn't that Dad, Mom, and Yaozu? What are they doing coming out of a jewelry store? Dad! Mom! Yaozu! I'm back! Who's this? My brother's fiancée? I can't believe it; he's getting married after all these years.
(Anxiously) Who are you? Don't just yell out. Yaozu, Zhenzhen, let's go quickly!

(Looking at Xu Meiling heartbroken) Mom! It's Zhaodi! I'm your daughter! Do you have any idea what I went through to see you all again? Mom, I nearly killed someone just to get back here, and you're saying this?
(Looking confused at the scene) Auntie, isn't Yaozu your only child? How come there's suddenly a sister? Who is this?

(Nodding quickly) Yes, yes, we only have Yaozu. I don't know where this woman came from. Look at her, talking about killing and not killing. She's probably crazy. I suggest you leave quickly, or we might have to call the police.

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi looks at the scene despairingly and says) Crazy? Call the police? Then go ahead, call them! Don't tell me you never looked for me when I went missing? Yeah, I've always been the one overlooked since I was little. Even when it was my brother's fault, I was the one punished and beaten! Since you love him so much, then I'll kill him and see how you can love him! Anyway, my life is already beyond repair. Remember, those who walk barefoot never fear those with shoes.

question: #question# How can Lin Zhaodi express her desperation and eventual madness after revealing her dissatisfaction?

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi, looking at the scene angrily, says) I only realized in the past that whenever my brother made a mistake, I was the one punished. Now I see your true nature. You're not fit to be parents. I want to kill you all. From today onwards, I'll go to jail. I won't let people like you live to pollute the world anymore.
(Lin Zhaodi, looking at the scene, says) Fine! Then call the police! Want me to bring out my ID, so we can all go to the station and let the police see if we're all on the same family register. Haha.

(Lin Zhaodi, looking at the scene in a fawning manner, says) Are you sure you don't recognize me? I even gave you a chubby grandson; he's adorable. I didn't mean to not come home; I was kidnapped. Mom, Dad, don't be mad.

(Upon realizing her parents don't recognize her, Lin Zhaodi leaves in despair. She decides to return for revenge against the Xu family. She finds Xu Changgui) Changgui, don't be mad. I went out these last few days to say goodbye to my family. From now on, I'll be good with you, and we'll raise our child together. We've been away for a while; I miss our child too. Let's go back for a while.

question: #question# How can Lin Zhaodi persuade Xu Changgui to return to Xu Village?

content.content: (Upon realizing her parents don't recognize her, Lin Zhaodi leaves in despair, wanting revenge on Xu Village. She finds Xu Changgui) Xu Changgui! I order you to take me back to Xu Village now. If you don't, I'll never return there. I'm leaving now. I'm ready to kill anyone who crosses me.

(Upon realizing her parents don't recognize her, Lin Zhaodi leaves in despair, and finds Xu Changgui) Boohoo, Changgui, my parents don't want me anymore. They said I wasn't their daughter when I went to find them. From now on, I only have you. I'll never leave; let's have a good life together. Let's kill everyone in my family, especially my annoying brother. How about it? We can traffic them to the village to be our slaves.

(Upon realizing her parents don't recognize her, Lin Zhaodi leaves in despair, wanting revenge on Xu Village. She finds Xu Changgui) Xu Changgui, you know what? When I went back to my parents, they didn't recognize me. This is all your fault. If it weren't for you, how could they deny me? I want to kill you.

dialog.content: (Xu Meiling looks impatiently at Lin Zhaodi) As expected, you're a lunatic. Yaozu, let's go.
(Lin Zhaodi watches the group about to leave, then rushes forward and stabs Lin Yaozu frantically) Die! Die! Don’t you all love him? Then I'll make him disappear forever.
(Lin Daqiang rushes forward in a panic, trying to cover the wound) Son! My son! You beast! He's your own brother!
(sneering) You finally acknowledge me, huh? Dad, didn't you all say you didn't know me and called me a lunatic? What's so strange about a lunatic killing someone?

Lin Zhaodi's ears are filled with the sounds of crying and discussion. Before long, the police and ambulance arrived. Lin Yaozu ultimately couldn't be saved, and Lin Zhaodi was sentenced to death for murder.

(Originally angry, Xu Changgui stopped when he heard Lin Zhaodi wanted to go home) Alright, I thought you were lying to me. Didn't expect the first thing you do when you come back is to leave again. Well, let's just go back for a while.
(The two return to Xu's village) Changgui, why are you back? Was Zhaodi misbehaving outside?

(Xu Changgui hurriedly replies) Mom, don't misunderstand. This time we went out, Zhaodi went to see her family. She said she plans to live well with me in the future. Maybe after some time, we can even visit the in-laws. It's almost New Year's, we'll head out after the holiday.
(Zhang Yulan brightens up after hearing this) Zhaodi, you really thought it through, staying in touch with the family. Coming back isn't easy, so let's wait until after New Year's to leave.

After some time, New Year's Eve arrived, and every household reunited on this day. Lin Zhaodi slipped deadly poison into the well water, which spread in all directions. Lin Zhaodi quietly began to eat the food on the table, and on New Year's Eve, funeral bells tolled for everyone.
(Wang Fang nods) Let’s hurry back. If they find out we’re trying to escape, it’ll be hard to get out again in the future.

(The two of them hurriedly returned to the previous place, and soon Zhang Yulan and the others were back.) Let's go home. You two are quite obedient; just now your Auntie was saying to keep you both here and not to sneak out. I told her you both went to school; if you get lost in the mountains, not even your bones will be left.

(They all went back together. Time flies, and the New Year is approaching.) This is Zhao Di's first New Year at our house, but it’s been quite a while. How come there's no movement from your belly? You aren't like a hen that can't lay eggs, are you? After the New Year, have that blind guy at the village entrance take a look at her.
(Lin Zhao Di dares not to speak and nods silently) Mm, I also want to conceive soon. I'll find time to check it out.

(It’s another year of spring planting, and the sky is overcast.) Zhao Di, everyone is busy with spring planting these days. We've also figured out the route to the county town. Should we take this opportunity to escape?

(Lin Zhao Di nods) I’ve been thinking the same thing. I’ve been trying to avoid getting pregnant. I wonder if they suspect me, urging me to get pregnant. Let’s pack some things; we must bring enough food.
(The next day, Lin Zhao Di and Wang Fang secretly leave. Before they left, they set a fire in the village.) Hmph, they deserve this fire. The whole village is in cahoots. So, where are we going?

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let's head straight to the county town. It's the quickest place to connect with the outside world. They’ve probably realized we've escaped; we don’t have much time and have to find a police station and report it as soon as possible.

question: #question#What should Lin Zhao Di say to reflect her urgency to report to the police station in the county town?

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di considers and says) Let’s go to the county town. There are more people there, so even if they know we've escaped, it’ll be harder for them to find us, making it easier for us to get away.
(Lin Zhao Di looks at Wang Fang speechlessly) Why are you still the same as before? It’s been so long, have you learned nothing new? All you ever think about is escaping.

(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Of course, we’re heading to the county town. The two of us have been in that rundown village for so long, we’ve become just like the village women. Let’s go to the county town to get ourselves sorted out.

(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let's go into the mountains. They’re definitely taking people around to search for us now—they know the roads here better than we do, and we'll get caught if we're not careful. Let them think we've left the village before we escape; they would never expect us to be hiding in the mountains.

question: #question#How does Lin Zhao Di thoroughly consider a plan to increase the success rate of their escape?

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let’s go into the mountains, there are wild fruits and spring water there. Even if we stay in the mountains, we can survive. The most dangerous place is the safest place!

(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let’s head to the county town first. There’s a police station there, and as long as we report it, we’ll be saved. Now it’s just about whether we can get there before they do, but we shouldn't rush; there's a chance the police are in cahoots with them.
(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let’s go into the mountains. Do you remember that mine tunnel? I always felt there’s a path behind it; we can check it out there.

dialog.content: (Wang Fang nods) You’re right, as long as we can call the police, we’ll be safe.
(Lin Zhaodi and her companion hurry along the road) Look ahead, we’ve reached the county town. Quick, we must find the police station, once we report to them, we’ll be saved.
(Several figures suddenly rush out from behind) You vile woman, stop right there and watch me beat you to death.

(Xu Changgui and Zhang Dayong savagely beat Lin Zhaodi and her companion) You two vile women dare to run? We know the shortcuts. And you had the nerve to burn the houses in the village. I guess you’re tired of living.

On the eve of entering the city, Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang were captured and taken back. The act of setting fires and escaping completely enraged them. The beating continued until the early hours. Lin Zhaodi’s hands and feet were shackled, and she never left that room again. A year later, unable to bear the torture, she bit her tongue and ended her life.
(Wang Fang nods) You're right, even though we know the way to the city, we probably can't outrun them. But where can we go by going into the mountains?
(They talk as they walk) Let's go to that mine from last time. The people in their village all think it's unlucky and they definitely won't look for us there.

(The two return to the spot where they found the body in the mine) Please bless us to make it out safely this time. Once we get out, we'll make sure the police come to take care of your body. Please, protect us.
(Lin Zhaodi quietly watches Wang Fang) After you're done praying, pack up her things. If we make it out, they could be used as identification.
(Wang Fang carefully picks up the items) Hey, these scissors, they're rusty but still usable, though there's probably not much use for them in this cave.

content.content: Let me think about it, maybe we should keep these scissors for self-defense. If we're unfortunately discovered, having a weapon might increase our chances of escaping. If I'm forced into a corner, I won't hesitate to trade life for life.

question: #question#How can Lin Zhaodi express her intention to use scissors for self-defense?

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi said speechlessly) What can a lousy pair of scissors do? Just toss it. Keep the school badge, once outside you can give it to the police for identification.
(Lin Zhaodi thought for a moment and said) How about using the scissors to take them out? Anyway, I don't think we can escape this time, at worst we'll just trade life for life.

(Lin Zhaodi thought for a moment and said) It really isn't much use. You know, even a little girl knows to carry scissors for self-defense, yet neither of us even brought a needle. We really took this lightly.

(Lin Zhaodi thought for a moment and said) I have an idea, we're too obvious a target, even if we escape, we'd be easily recognized. How about cutting our hair to disguise ourselves as men? This way, even if we're seen, they might not recognize us.

question: #question#Lin Zhaodi comes up with lots of new ideas. How can she improve the chances of a successful escape?

content.content: (Lin Zhaodi thought for a moment and said) You think about it; I don't have any good suggestions right now.
(Lin Zhaodi glanced at Wang Fang and said) If it's useless, just throw it away. Keeping the school badge should be enough; the scissors can't identify us anyway.

(Lin Zhaodi thought for a moment and said) Just keep it. I don't know what it might be good for, but it's better to have more stuff. The way it is, we might have to stay in this cave a few more days, so let's think this through.

dialog.content: (Wang Fang nods) You're right, it's good to have something for self-defense, but don't get too worked up. They would never expect us to be hiding in the mountains. We'll definitely escape this time.
(Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang have been hiding in the cave for a few days) Let's go. It should be safe after hiding for so many days. It's so late at night, no one on the road will notice us.
(The two of them finally rushed into the city by noon) Ah~ We finally made it into the city. Let's hurry.

(Just as Lin Zhaodi is about to leave, a voice rings out) Hey, isn't that Xu Changgui's runaway daughter-in-law? And beside her... Wang Fang! You two stop right there! Before leaving, you even set my house on fire. Grab them! Everyone thought you two got away, but look at that, we ran into you two bitches right here in the town.

Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang never thought that after all this time, the villagers would still be searching for them. Their act of burning the house had infuriated them. In her struggle, Lin Zhaodi tried to take out scissors for self-defense, but a villager managed to snatch it away. They were taken back, and as the torment increased day after day, Lin Zhaodi lost her sanity.
(Wang Fang exclaims with delight) Zhao Di, you're so clever! How did I not think of it? You go first and cut mine.
(Nods) It's nothing, it just came to me. I don't have any skill; I just cut it to look ugly. The uglier it is, the less likely we'll be noticed.
(Wang Fang nods) At this point, who cares if it's ugly? We'll change our clothes too, make them a bit torn and dirty.
(Lin Zhao Di and the others hid in a cave for several days) Let's go, we should be safe after hiding for so long. It's the dead of night, no one will see us.
(They successfully enter the town) Don't move, don’t move! I think I see Zhang Dayong's mom. Be careful and sneak past.
(They weren't recognized by the villagers through their disguise) That scared me half to death. How can they still be looking for us after all this time? Let's quickly report this to the police.

(Wang Fang speaks with relief after narrowly escaping) It's a good thing we disguised ourselves and escaped. Should we still report them to the police? They’re so persistent; I'm afraid they’ll retaliate if we do.

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) I understand how you feel. I'm also afraid they'll retaliate. Maybe we should just go straight to the station, leave here, and never come back. This place has nothing to do with us.

question: #question# How should Lin Zhao Di express her understanding of Wang Fang's fear of retaliation and decision to leave by bus?

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di looks at Wang Fang and says) Actually, I'm also scared. I'm afraid they'll retaliate against us, but what can we do? We should go to the police anyway.

(Lin Zhao Di looks speechlessly at Wang Fang) Don't be so selfish, okay? Did you forget you said in the cave that you'd take that girl home? If you don't, she might come for you in the middle of the night.
(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) No way! We can't back down. We've been tormented long enough. I won't let those in Xu's Village get away with it.

(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Don't be afraid, we need to report this to the police. The law will protect us, and we must ensure those villains get the punishment they deserve to prevent further harm to others.
(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) You're right, let's just leave it. If they've been chasing us this long, it shows their vengeful nature. We should look out for our own safety.

question: #question# How can Lin Zhao Di demonstrate her belief that the police will protect others from harm through courageous actions?

content.content: (Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) Let's go to the police. Although I also suspect the police here might be corrupt, we have no other choice.
(Lin Zhao Di comforts Wang Fang) Don't be afraid; I’ll be with you. Even if they retaliate, it's not scary with me by your side, even if it means we die together.
(Lin Zhao Di thinks for a moment and says) We should still go to the police. Don't you think our brave deeds should be reported by the police?

dialog.content: (Wang Fang looks at Lin Zhaodi with distress) Can we really do this? Isn’t this wrong in some way?
(Lin Zhaodi pulls Wang Fang along) Since we're leaving, let's leave decisively. We can't even protect ourselves, let alone worry about others. Let's head to the station.
(The two are stopped outside the station due to their tattered clothing) Hello, we're not beggars, we just look a bit shabby. Please let us in, we have money.
(The number of onlookers increases, suddenly a hand grabs Lin Zhaodi's hand) Got you, you little thieves! You stole my money and now want to run away? Let's see if I don't drag you to the police!
(Zhang Dayong also steps forward to grab Wang Fang's hand and covers her mouth) Sorry about this, these two stole our money. Just look at them, they look like beggars. We'll be taking them away now.
Lin Zhaodi and Wang Fang struggled desperately, but no one paid any attention. They were taken back to Xu's village, their limbs broken, and were never seen again.
(Wang Fang looks into Lin Zhaodi's eyes) Zhaodi, you’re amazing, really! I’ll be brave too, for the sake of more people.
(patting Wang Fang's head) Don't worry, I’ll be right by your side. Even if there’s retaliation, I'm in it with you.
(grabbing Lin Zhaodi's hand) What are you saying? You’re right, we need to go to the police, and I promised that girl in the mine I’d take her home.
(The two enter the police station) Officer, we were abducted to Xu Family Village. I want to report Xu Family Village as a human trafficking den.

With the help of the police, Lin Zhaodi returned to her hometown and reunited with her family. With her and Wang Fang’s assistance, the police completely dismantled the Xu Family Village human trafficking ring, rescuing 14 women and children. Lin Zhaodi finally had a new lease on life.
